page.title: 12Glenalmond:House master (1)
page.content: {Daily Routine:}The in college house master does not live in the 'house' so he arrives at his study between 8 o'clock and 8.15 and will then attend to pressing matters until chapel. He teaches three to five periods and then, between the end of lessons and lunch he runs the house 'bank' and deals with punishments etc. Following lunch he takes games, according to his abilities. Later he returns to his study to work until 7 o'clock. He is on duty from 8 to 11 o'clock when he finds time to work and see prefects as well as boys. {Life style:}Although the in college house master does not live in the house, his home and study are connected by telephone. In spite of this he has to rely heavily on the prefects and tutors to solve internal problems.
